Articles.Content: Put together a little work in progress mod/blog repository, only have a few hours of coding into it so far so it's a work in progress. If you have a moment, take a peek. http://kspshare.com
How is this different/better than Kerbal Spaceport?

1.) It might not be allowed to make third party content websites that involve KSP, as we had an issue with one.

2.) We have spaceport and no need for this.
I don't see matter to have third party website for download. there's many site out there do same thing. Keep up with it, I like your site.... *whisper: than spaceport*
Interesting to see another KSP fan-made site. I would really like to see something like what we had before .18 came out (it was something like 'kerbal.net', if I remember).

Its missing links, some things don't work, a bit unpolished...I know - this was something that I did in a few hours 'for fun' as I have available web space and a free domain coupon to use. I have NO interest in it being any sort of competitor to an official repo. I like and use the spaceport.

I may end up taking things in a whole different direction as different ideas pop into my head and from hearing the community. I do freelance web work mostly for small Joe the plumber types of businesses - it's fun to do a project that I have an interest in for a change. And there's nothing wrong with having fan made websites out there - I think that's more of what this game needs actually.

Edited May 1, 2013 by Mishkin_007
If I were you I would set this up as a way to share save files/challenges. That way we can have a centralized place for cool user scenarios.

If I were you I would set this up as a way to share save files/challenges. That way we can have a centralized place for cool user scenarios.

Intriguing thought, elaborate a bit more in a PM to me.

Decided to ditch the idea as I don't think the community deserves it at this point in time, far too many negative attitudes in here and on reddit. No wonder why squad stopped interacting. Mods can feel free to close/lock/delete this topic.

Edited May 1, 2013 by Mishkin_007
